rows.heading: Predators of soft-bodied pests
rows.description: These are insects that feed on small and soft-bodied insect pests such as aphids.
rows.examples: Examples include: Ladybugs, Lacewings, and Syrphid flies (Hover flies).

rows.heading: Parasitoids
rows.description: These are insects whose larvae live as parasites, and eventually, kill the host insect pest.
rows.examples: Parasitoids include species of wasps, flies and beneficial nematodes

rows.heading: Predators of larger insect pests
rows.description: These are insects that feed on large insect pests such as caterpillars.
rows.examples: Examples include: Praying mantis, Dragonflies, Ground beetles, Robber flies, and Wasps.

rows.heading: Other insect eaters
rows.description: These are animals such as rodents, birds, frogs e.t.c. that feed on insect pests.
rows.examples: Examples include: Birds, Frogs, Scorpions, Giant rats and also Bats.
